title: v2.54.0 Cannot be stopped gracefully.
body:
Node Version:
> git_branch=heads/v2.54.0 git_tag=v2.54.0-dirty git_commit=aeec5221c93be843d282e34379d9281e68906f79

My node is never able to find GoodPeers, so I want to restart the node. But I waited for a long time for the node to still not end properly, and I tried to keep `kill` it; it didn't really end until after a `panic` occurred. (This was not a problem in the old version)

Start Arguments:
```
        - "--chain=bor-mainnet"
        - "--http"
        - "--http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon,bor"
        - "--private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090"
        - "--http.port=8545"
        - "--http.addr=0.0.0.0"
        - "--http.vhosts=*"
```
